description: Write a method called `isValid(String s)` that determines if brackets are valid (properly opened and closed).
output_specification: Expected output format will be shown.
explanations: '()' is valid - opening and closing match
'()[]{}' is valid - all pairs match correctly
notes: Must close brackets in correct order
Every opening bracket must have matching closing bracket
Use a stack data structure for efficient solution
hints: Use Stack to track opening brackets
When you see closing bracket, check if it matches stack top
String is valid if stack is empty at the end
